name: Burger Cooking Restaurant Maker Jam - the mama king food shop in a jolly diner story dash game!
name_original: Burger Cooking Restaurant Maker Jam - the mama king food shop in a jolly diner story dash game!
description:
Do you have what it takes to run this hamburger shop?

Make burgers quickly or your customers will get angry and leave your store!!

Have soooo much fun!
